document.docAuthor: Gonçalves, Clayton C. & Domahovski, Alexandre C.
document.docTitle: Takiyaella anomala Gonçalves & Domahovski 2021, gen. et sp. nov.
document.masterDocTitle: A new genus and five new species of Neocoelidiinae leafhoppers from Brazil (Insecta: Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) with a key to males

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A new genus and five new species of Neocoelidiinae leafhoppers from Brazil (Insecta: Hemiptera: Cicadellidae) with a key to males

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Laboratório de Entomologia, Departamento de Zoologia, Instituto de Biologia, Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro. Caixa Postal 68044, 21941 - 971, Rio de Janeiro, RJ, Brazil.
Departamento de Zoologia, Universidade Federal do Paraná. Caixa Postal 19020, 81531 - 980, Curitiba, PR, Brazil.

subSubSection.paragraph: The specific epithet alludes to the singular set of morphological characteristics of this species.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Holotype
BRAZIL • ♂ ; Rio de Janeiro , Cachoeiras de Macacu , REGUA [Reserva Ecológica de Guapiaçu], ponto 4 , casa de pesquisa , trilha verde ; 22°24′28.30″ S , 42°44′16.10″ W ; alt.
296 m
;
25 May 2019
; R.L.C. Baptista leg.; coleta visual alta diurna [daytime high visual collection]; DZRJ-AUCH #238; DZRJ .

Paratypes
BRAZIL –
Rio de Janeiro
• 1 ♂ , 1 ♀ ; Itatiaia , PNI [ Parque Nacional de Itatiaia ], Lago Azul , mata , PNI-M3B; 22°27′1.10″ S , 44°36′55.30″ W ; alt.
830 m
;
1–3 Dec. 2015
; Biota FAPERJ leg.; Malaise trap ; MNRJ
•
1 ♀ ; same collection data as for preceding; DZUP-083604 ; DZUP
.
HEAD AND THORAX. External morphological characters as in generic description.

caption.paragraph:
Fig. 1.
Takiyaella anomala
gen. et sp. nov. , ♂, holotype (DZRJ-AUCH #238). A . Head and thorax, dorsal view. B . Head, frontal view. C . Head and thorax, lateral view. D . Forewing. E . Pygofer and anal tube, lateral view. F . Valve and subgenital plate, lateral view. G . Valve and subgenital plate, ventral view. H . Styles and connective, dorsal view. I . Style, lateral view. J . Aedeagus, lateral view. K . Aedeagus, ventral view. Scale bars: A–C = 1.0 mm; D = 2.0 mm; E–I = 0.5 mm; J–K = 0.4 mm.

Fig. 2.
Takiyaella anomala
gen. et sp. nov. , ♀, paratype (MNRJ). A . Posterior portion of abdomen, ventral view. B . Posterior portion of abdomen, lateral view. C . Sternite VII, ventral view. D . Pygofer and anal tube, lateral view. E . First valvifer and first valvula of ovipositor, lateral view. F . Apex of first valvula, lateral view. G . Second valvula of ovipositor, lateral view. H . Apex of second valvula, lateral view. I . Second valvifer and gonoplac, lateral view. J . Apex of gonoplac, lateral view. Scale bars: A–B = 1.0 mm; C–E, G, I = 0.5 mm; F, H, J = 0.3 mm.
